name: Sylph's Tetris
description:
Controls - WASD 
S - Soft Drop
W - Hard Drop
Arrow keys also work.
QE - Rotate piece

Help Sylph train casting her spells against a training dummy by playing tetris!

For a gameJam.

Credits:
AndrewCrowe - Music - Art - Some of the code
Zigurous's channel - tetris tutorial - Code
